comments:
I20071101213525

Formatting a .css file, even one with just whitepsace, is always showing an error in the log.  It doesn't seem to be a problem when it's embedded within an HTML file.

I know I changed something recently that had to do with rewrite sessions and formatting.  I must've neglected css formatting.

Created an attachment (id=82149)
org.eclipse.wst.css.core.patch

This bug was due to changes made to fix bug 81583.
Fix was in FormatProcessorCSS#formatModel(), make sure to check if already in rewrite session before trying to enter it again.
